# lyne-toggle-multi

## Properties

| Property            | Attribute             | Description                                             | Type      | Default               |
| ------------------- | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------------- |
| `checkedToggle`     | `checked-toggle`      |                                                         | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `disabled`          | `disabled`            |                                                         | `boolean` | `undefined`           |
| `eventId`           | `event-id`            | Id which is sent in the click event payload             | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `firstOptionLabel`  | `first-option-label`  | The label for the first radio option                    | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `firstOptionValue`  | `first-option-value`  | The value for the first radio option                    | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `label`             | `label`               | Label text for the radio group (visually hidden).       | `string`  | `'Radio Group Label'` |
| `name`              | `name`                | The name attribute to use with the radio group elements | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `secondOptionLabel` | `second-option-label` | The label for the second radio option                   | `string`  | `undefined`           |
| `secondOptionValue` | `second-option-value` | The value for the second radio option                   | `string`  | `undefined`           |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                            |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| `"unnamed"` | Slot to render svg icon. You must pass an svg-element. |
